nerd: You can make most of your problems go away by stabbing them.

One woman will give birth to a child roughly 9months after conception. You can't bring that time down to 4.5 month simply by adding a second woman. :-)  Adding more women will improve the overall productivity, but not the individual childbearing period. Adding more men will not help at all!
